title: Basic law terms
creator_credit: Robert Gordon, Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited Film Corporation and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Shows young people how the law can work for them rather than against them. Distinguishes civil law from criminal law, provides a dramatised explanation of torts and contracts, and defines the medieval practice of “outlawing” people for he who defies the law is outside of it. Presented by Joseph Campanella.
